author: tedyu
msg: HBASE-5579 A Delete Version could mask other values (Daniel Ferro)

author: jfthomps
msg: added fix for receiving x86_64 as the arch, and if so, treat it as x86 so that symlinks do not need to be created

author: jfthomps
msg: added code to better handle when the node only has one disk but it is detected as /dev/sdb instead of /dev/sda
corrected and improved some error messages
added loop at end of script to sleep forever if 'reboot' was not passed on the kernel command line

author: rmannibucau
msg: adding openejb.modulename.useHash property to be able to avoid conflict between multiple deployement of the same webapp
